1.content: Who's the lucky guy today?
1.title: Pick your man

choices: wins a trip to Japan and invites his dad Jack and his half brother Rusty
all men somehow gain weight with Stan being the fattest
11.title: Stan Smith

112.content: Stan finds a flyer about a sumo wrestling tournament. He then decideds to find the fastest way to become so big, he will win. Where will he go?
112.title: eating

choices: He's not ready yet, he's still HUNGRY!
1121.content: Stan goes to a chinese restraunt and orders and mega noodle combo with beef. He first drank quickly of some water to add some water weight. When he received his meal, he swallowed the whole thing in one big bite, that, he shirt and pants started rippening off of him.
1121.title: Chinese Restruant

choices: Stan starts to grow, doesn't explode, but burst out of the restaurant
11212.content:
"Excuse me waiter," Stan says as he snaps his fingers in the air "Bring me he most dog prepared meal you have!"

"Yes,sir.", They young waiter said.

As Stan waits for his food he looks around the restaurant looking at the other costumers' food. He came to the conclusion, "Why wait for something when you could have it now!", he said aloud. Stan rose from his chair while his belly jiggled slowly. He went to table one where a couple at the age of their late 20s were eating.

"Hello, are you going to finish that?", Stan said as he gobbled up both of the lover's food and drink sprinting to next table and then to the next.

The rest of the costumers were furious with Stan and his antics and let out of the restaurant in a huff. The owner, Hsu Chia Hao, noticed the customers leave and glaring at Stan with totally understandable malice.

"You White Fat American Buffoon! You ruined my business! Get out!", Hsu says while pushing Stan to the door.

"Oh no you don't.", Stan says after pulling out his gun, pointing it at the head of the owner. "Now I am going to every piece of food in this place to become sumo. Do you understand?"

*Gulp* "Y-Yes, sir", said Hsu.

"Good. And if I find one piece of food not served, I will eat you. Rick Ross Style."

The employees bolted back into the kitchen preparing food for Stan, while Stan himself is drinking water from 12L bulk sized jugs. Hsu decided to gift Stan a little gift while he was eating. He calls all of his employees to join and huddle.

"Ok,team. I'm going to put this secret Chinese herbal drop of liquid to that bloat lard-ass. It's tasteless, clear, and untraceable. So when he is finish eating all of his food, and I do mean all, he'll blow up like a gallon".

After Stan's food comes out, Stan eats it all then...
11212.title: He's not ready yet, he's still HUNGRY!

choices: Stan wants to find out what happened
Stan is ok with what happened
112121.content:
The waiters start to come out one-by-one pushing a cart with a tray of food stacked on it. They all circle Stan and gave him his food. As Stan started to eat the waiters ran back inside the kitchen giggling to wait and see the weight herb take its effects on Stan. Two hours pass and Stan is actually licking the bowl clean off of every meal. When Stan finally finished he pushes the table away and groans in pain.

Stan: Oh, I don't feel too hot right now.

Stan takes off his jacket and has a sip of water,then things start to get weird. Stan's belly starts to gurgle and rumble furiously. His belt snaps open and his belly starts growing. Stan is shocked to see what is happening to him as he start to inflate like a balloon filling up with air.

Stan: What's happening to me?!, He said as his body started to grow taller causing his head to hit the roof and his belly continuing to grow rapidly. Finally,Stan burst out of the whole restaurant
112121.title: Stan starts to grow, doesn't explode, but b...

113.content:
Stan was on an important CIA mission to track down a person who calls himself "The Force-Feeder." Stan was told what "The Force-Feeder" was cabable of. He kidnappes men and makes them fat!

"That's not gonna happen to me!" Said Stan out loud.

But little did Stan know, he WAS the next victim to be fattend by "The Force-Feeder." Than, just as Stan got closer to "The Force-Feeder's" hideout, he felt a blow to his head, knocking him out, cold...
113.title: gets kidnapped and force feed

choices: he was shirtless and had a slightly bigger belly
he was still wearing his shirt, and the buttons were about to pop from his gut
1131.content:
He awoke half an hour later. "Ohhh...my head..." was the first thing he said. He looked around and noticed he was in a big empty warehouse.

"Where am I? And why can't I move my arms and legs?!" Said Stan, trying to free himself from the strapes on his arms and legs.

As he struggled, he looked down to see that...
1131.title: half an hour later...

choices: He wants to win a dare
115.title: more choices

12.content: How/Why does he gain weight than?
12.title: Jack Smith (Stan's father)

121.content: How fat does he get?
121.title: Prison makes him fatter

1211.content:
Jack Smith struggled to pull up his jeans and sighed. He'd always been proud of his fit body but at 42 after serving 5 years in prison for robbery, it seemed that he'd lost control. He'd vowed to turn his life around and those five years had earned him a degree and the body of a god. Focusing on study and weight lifting had kept him sane. His wife had divorced him but his son was still in his life through letters and now living in the same town.

Luckily he was able to get a job in accounting with an opportunity for a career. The new job was demanding in both time and effort which was a good thing. Jack was appreciated and rewarded for his effort. But he no longer had the time or energy for the heavy workouts that had built his hard muscled physique. And the big appetite he had developed while growing his muscles didn't go away. He enjoyed his meals and the result was after six months on the outside Jack had packed on 59 pounds of new weight and it wasn't muscle. At first it was mostly a basketball sized ball belly but lately his ass had grown.

There were a few chuckles at work as Jack's muscular fit body began to round out. "Looking more like an accountant." his boss had commented giving Jack's belly a finger poke. Alex, Jack's boss was approaching 350 pounds with a soft flabby belly. Jack was currently 225, 50 pounds over the studly 175 when he got out of prison. "Just a few pounds," Jack replied. "I'll have that gone by Christmas."
"Whatever you say." Alex replied. Alex had seen Jack out eat him and Alex knew his way around a buffet. It would take a famine to slim him down.

Jack was in denial. In his mind, all he needed to do was get back into serious gym work and maybe cut back on a snack or two. For now, though, he needed to get his pants let our.
1211.title: 50 lbs. fatter

12111.content:
Jack was in his second month of serious gym training. He had a trainer checking his progress each week and so far he was pleased with his progress and commitment. "It was like riding a bicycle." Jack thought. He checked the scale. Still 225. Disappointing but Rome wasn't built in a day. He might be imagining but it seemed that his pants were't so snug. Maybe he wouldn't be going up to 36's after all.
"How's it going, Jack."
It was his trainer, Craig.
"Good." Jack replied. "Not losing any weight yet but it feels good."
Craig grinned and nodded. He was used to working with ex-jocks. They were totally in denial when their metabolisms .slowed down.
"You are doing good." Craig told him. "But if you want to drop the weight from your gut you need to watch how you eat. I can set you up with a diet plan if you want to speed up your progress. I started getting pudgy after I hit forty but with my exercise program and a better diet, I'm down to 10% body fat, working on 5%."
"Not ready for that yet." Jack replied. "I'll just see how it goes with the exercise."
Jack showered and dressed. Craig looked pretty fit for a forty something with a nice V shaped torso, lean abs and a firm butt but Jack was confident that he would soon look just as good. He posed in front of the mirror and sucked in his gut. It wouldn't be long before he would look good without sucking it in.
Now for the high point of the day- dinner. Working out certainly stimulated the appetite.
At the four month point Jack is fitter but
12111.title: Jack makes time for gym

121112.content:
"Damn." Jack deliberately hadn't checked his weight since he was still able to button his 34's . Sure he still sported a gut but it was firm and round. Was it bigger? Jack didn't know and, right now, didn't want to find out. Still this wasn't the way he had planned. He figured that his weight would drop now that he was working out. He rationalized that the new weight must be muscle. He would live with being bigger so long as it was muscle and not fat. He posed showing his guns. They looked impressive to Jack.
"Guns are growing, big man."
Jack dropped the pose and turned to see Craig.
"I like that." Jack said. "But I gained ten pounds. Not sure where it went."
"Arms and chest from what I see." Craig answered. "But you still have the belly. Gonna have to eat better to slim that down."
"It's just taking time." Jack answered. "I've got it under control."

Jack changed into his street cloths, noticing that it was a struggle to get the waist buttoned. He sat down to tie his shoes and rrrrrrrrrrrp, his but blew out the seat of his slacks.
121112.title: now weighs 235

choices: Stan moves in with his girlfriend.
1211121.content:
"I won't be wearing these long." Jack muttered heading home with three new pairs of size 38 slacks. They were a bit snug but Jack wasn't about to get 40's for just a few weeks. Jack kept his gym commitment but was having a harder time with his diet.
It didn't help that his son, Stan had been staying with him. They hadn't been close since Jack went to prison but Stan had been hard up since getting laid off at work. He'd gotten a job - temporary he hoped- at Mcdonald's but it didn't pay enough for him to have his own apartment so Jack let him sleep on the couch. Stan was a gamer and pudgy as a youth but he had gotten fatter lately. Jack was trying to be a good influence in his life, offering him a gym membership and showing him a healthy lifestyle but Stan was a slob and resistant to moderation in the food department.
"If you are staying with me," Jack told Stan, "Stop being such a pig. Pick up your trash. And cut back. You are way too fat. It's not good for you."
"Yeah, Dad. " Stan muttered.
Jack's healthy dinners were set against Stan's fast food orgies and Jack was tempted but he persisted until...
1211121.title: Jack moves on to 38's

1211122.content:
Jack figured he'd be moving up to 36 inch pants. At the store he discovered that he couldn't even pull 36's over his butt. 38's were too small and it took 40's to allow room for is butt.
"This is ridiculous." he muttered paying for the fat pants. "I'll have to get serious even if it means starving myself for a while, No way I'm gonna let my self get any bigger."
After a little research, Jack decided on a sensible eating plan. He wasn't going to starve himself like a model or pare down to meat and vegetables like a body builder. He' been fine until recently and he had probably been eating a bit too heartily so if he just cut back on his portion sizes and eliminated the snacks, he'd be lean and mean in no time.
Day one started just fine. Jack had always been a believer in a hearty breakfast. It should be easy to go leaner. Jack decided that instead of fixing his own breakfast- normally two eggs, toast and a bowl of cereal, he'd eat on the way to work., get a small filling breakfast sandwich and coffee. He'd be good until noon and calories ahead. He showed up at work feeling good and ready for his first day on the way to lean. So fat so good.
1211122.title: Jack decides to diet

12111222.content:
By the time lunch rolled around, Jack was ready. Normally lunch would be a fast food combo but today Jack was going healthy. Just a salad and diet drink. Let his buds joke. Jack would be lean and mean again. Back at his desk, his belly grumbled but Jack was firm. Normally Jack would have a beer or two with his buds before heading home for dinner.
"Not tonight."
He waved off the urging s to join in and stopped at the gym instead. Then home for a chicken breast and steamed zucchini dinner.
12111222.title: Now for a healthy lunch

121113.content:
Jack, after four months of gym training, is seeing the results of his efforts, His chest is firmer. His guns are bigger and his belly is tighter although nowhere near flat. He was still wearing 34's. They were even a bit loose. He was convinced that he had turned the corner and on his way back to the lean 175 body that was his goal..
"Making progress, Big Guy." Craig had been encouraging while Jack was working to regain his old physique but Jack thought he was making too much of the big guy comments.
"Not so big anymore." Jack answered, flexing his guns puffing his chest and sucking in his gut. "I'm a lean, mean Gym machine."
"Definitely getting the muscle back but you still are bigger than you would like and I don't want you to forget that you have a long way to go so until you get under 200, you are gonna be big guy to me."
Jack waved him on and got into his street clothes. He was making progress and he knew it. Craig was just trying to jerk his chain. He'd be back on track in no time.
As was his usual habit, Jack stopped at the sports bar on the way home. He'd have a beer and small steak with a salad on the side but tonight he was feeling really good about his progress.
"Bring me the 16 ounce porterhouse with a baked potato and some creamed spinach and a tall beer. I'm celebrating."
After dinner, some more beer and a wedge of pie ala mode, Jack felt even more satisfied. He'd forgotten how good it felt having a fully stuffed belly. This was how life is supposed to be.
121113.title: Slmmer

1211133.content:
After his big celebration dinner, Jack got back to his weight loss program. Even Craig was impressed. And those 34's were actually loose. Things were going Jack's way finally.
"Jack, would you see me in my office?"
Jack's boss, Bob had appeared at his cube.
"Sure, boss." Jack answered. "Right away."
Bob had not been a fan of Jack at first, checking all his work and never giving encouragement but lately Jack was thinking that he had made the grade. Bob hadn't been on his case for some time now. Jack was beginning to feel secure in his place in the office. As his confidence improved, he had focused more on losing the weight and getting in shape. Now, following Bob back to his corner office that confidence was waning.
He had never liked Bob. Bob was everything Jack wasn't. A college athlete, graduating with honors at State and handsome to boot, Bob had married the owner's daughter and produced 5 grandkids. He was gold plated. Bob didn't flaunt his perfection. He was oblivious to it. Never seemed to consider himself superior but never showed any lack of confidence that the world was his oyster. Still it was important to suck up to the owner's favorite so Jack had always tried to be respectful and pleasant. As he followed Bob he noticed, for the first time, that Bob had a nice plump ass. Had it always been so well endowed? Jack stopped speculating. He was more worried about what Bob had to say.
"Sit down." Bob said as he shut the door and parked his luscious ass on his office chair and leaned back. Jack notice that his studly boss seemed to have a bit of belly instead of the toned torso.
"Jack," Bob began solemnly, "You'e been with us over six months now and lately, I've been impressed with your work. Bob appeared serious and focused on Jack while unconsciously his hands.began cradled the small belly pooching over his belt. "You have been very thorough and inventive in handling the work and I want you to take over a unit. I'd like to see how you can handle managing. staff. Are you ready for the challenge?"
"Ready boss." Jack replied. "Anything you need."
One hour later, Jack was back at his desk contemplating a new life in an office with a door and wondering about what other services might please his boss.
1211133.title: Jack gets a promotion

choices: I'd like another basket of garlic bread
12111331.content:
Lunch with the bass had been better than Jack had expected. Bob had been open and friendly, discussing the new responsibilities and getting better acquainted. They had lunch in a high end steakhouse, way above Jack's normal routine. Bob had announced that he was planning to have a big lunch and that Jack should feel free to have whatever he liked. We are going to take our time and so there probably won't be any need to get back to the office today.
Bob ordered a martini, Jack, a manhattan and over drinks they perused the menu. "The steaks here are so good, I need to get the 12 oz or I feel cheated. I used to freak out about keeping fit but with three kids and a job, well a man needs some pleasure."
The waiter was back. "Give me the 12 oz strip, baked potato, creamed spinach. Oh and another martini and the wine list. And one of those baskets of garlic bread."
Jack might have gone for a lighter lunch but, the boss was buying and , for now, Jack wanted to such up.
The two men chowed down. Bob, to Jack's surprise was quite a trencherman. He practically inhaled his lunch while Jack worked through it. Bob leaned back showing a respectable beginner paunch while he watched Jack eat. Then he waved over the waiter.
12111331.title: Lunch with the boss.

choices: Jack gets serious with the weights
Bob asks Jack if he plays golf.
121113311.content:
Jack was only halfway into his steak and had barely touched his potato. He didn't think he was a slow eater but now he was feeling embarrassed. It was certainly good food and yet Jack didn't want to feel conspicuous so he began eating faster. Bob didn't seem to mind. He ordered another bottle of wine and dug into his second potato- this one nearly twice the size of the first one. Bob ate a bit slower now. Jack didn't know if he was letting his catch up or was just getting full. All the while chatting about the office and the difficulties of being the trophy jock husband of the bosses favorite daughter. How he fathered four grandchildren that made the oll man happy as hell and how finally the old man had gotten into golf and was letting him manage the business- more or less.
"The old man is fat as a hog and ugly as sin. It galled him to have a good looking jock for a son-in-law but he liked it too. Made him more relatable. I;m talking too much. Lets get desert."
Bob waved the desert cart over.
121113311.title: Bring me another baked potato

1211133111.content:
Work got easier for Jack after his lunch meeting with Bob. Jack realized that Bob was human too and it was now easier to interact. Jack began to feel more confident about his future. He continued to work out at the gym and after his big feed with the boss kept to a healthy diet. Bob, it seemed, had embraced a more indulgent lifestyle. In the past six months, Bob had moved into the serious exjock category as his gut ballooned and his chest and ass softened. He was clearly in the range of 250, at least. Getting properly fat.
Bob had scheduled a mid-morning meeting with Jack. Bob was working a more relaxed work schedule these days, getting in around 10 and leaving at 2 or so for a late lunch and then not coming back. This worked just fine for Jack who was taking over more the office management functions. Jack arrived promptly and Bob waved him in. "Shut the door." he said smiling. "have a seat."
After some small talk, Bob got to the point. "I want you to take over this office. I'll still be in charge officially but, day to day, it's yours."
Jack was dumbfounded. He had been given a rather free hand in running his operation and over time more functions had been moved under his authority but he never expected to be in charge.
"So, Bob," Jack said, "What are you doing? Moving up to the headquarters? Prepping to take over the whole show?"
Bob laughed. "Not at all. I'm just planning to enjoy myself more, play golf, travel. And I'm the boss now. I bought this division from corporate and it's all my show. Carol and I are divorcing and part of the settlement is getting my piece of the business. Naturally there will be a big bump in pay. I'm going to stay close while you get comfortable with the new situation."
At this point Bob's belly growled.
"I think its time for lunch," he said. "We can talk more there. You drive. We are going to the club and I've been staying there since the separation. I'm learning to love a nice nap after lunch these days."
1211133111.title: Jack gets another promotion.

1211133112.content: While Bob continued to transition from jock to porky executive, Jack got serious about weights. Focusing on lifting and getting stronger caused Jack to evolve his eating. He found that he needed serious fuel to support building his muscles and because more focused on quantity and less on quality. Bob liked providing treats for the office, principally from Jacks perspective so that he had access to nibbles any time he wanted. The two men were becoming more compatible than Jack had ever thought. The lean alpha Bob from before was becoming a pudgy beta while Jack was developing his alpha. They met frequently in the break room keeping their bellies full. Even developing a friendly rivalry over who ate the most donuts.Both men were gaining weight and even growing bellies but Bob's was flabby and soft while Jack's was firm and hard. They even joked about who's was bigger until one day, the office assistant brought in a tape measure and challenged them to a competition. Which man had the bigger gut?
1211133112.title: Jack gets serious with the weights

12111331121.content:
Jack was surprised that Bob agreed to the belly competition. Only two years ago Bob had seemed the aloof, fit executive, barely registering in the office social life. He had warmed up and become more approachable as he gained weight and lately it was hard to remember when his belly was flat, The measurement was promoted throughout the office and so at 3 o clock Rick, the office intern introduced the competitors. There were other contestants but the clear battle was between Bob and Jack.
Between the two, Jack was the most reluctant. His original fitness goal was lean muscle but gradually, his competitiveness took over and he dedicated himself to lift heavier. The unintended consequence had been getting heavier himself and eventually Jack' belly grew. Bob had long ago given up any self consciousness about being fat, in fact he seemed proud of his belly and his gluttony.
Rick was playing up the competitiveness and now each man was ready for the measurement clad in posing shorts under voluminous robes.
"Gentlemen," Rick announced. "Take your positions."
Both men removed their robes to gasps or admiration from the staff. Bob was round with heavy moobs and a belly that flowed over and covered his briefs. To balance his belly Bob had a well-endowed butt. When he paraded across the platform his body rippled and flowed like jelly in a bag. He grinned with the attention and struck a pose on one side of the platform.
Jack on the other had was firm. Big bulging pecs and biceps, thick firm thighs and a tight ass set off a magnificent ball belly standing high and proud above a relatively tiny waist. The crowd gave an aah of admiration as Jack posed on the other side of the platform.
:The official measurement began. Rick announced that each would be measured at the navel
12111331121.title: They agree

121113311211.content:
After the competition, both Bob and Jack enjoyed the attention. Jack had won with nearly two inches over Bob. Jack loved the win but was not that happy with achieving the biggest belly. Bob was disappointed but also relieved at not being the biggest. Now, away from the event, the two men were having a beer - or three.
"You saved me from myself." Bob was waxing mellow and reflective. "W year ago I would have been embarrassed as hell to participate in a beer belly competition. I'd been such a self-conscious, egotistical fitness freak all my life. And then I just told myself that, heck- what's the diff. Who cares that I'm fit and have a 32 inch waist and stopped depriving myself of pleasure. I knew I wasn't quite the eye candy I always wanted to be and I didn't care. But I also had ignored wearing 42 inch slacks with a belly that hung over my belt. I was now the fat guy in the office until you took over. Thanks."
"Kinda surprised myself. Been working on the muscle and not worrying about the weight but until the competition I was not trying to build a belly. Turns out that the extra weight contributes to heavier lifts. Thought I might work it off now that the competition is over. Now I am having second thoughts. Think I might just keep going bigger. What about you?"
Bob thought a moment. then said
121113311211.title: Jack is bigger

choices: Gets invited to Stan's house and overeats
13.content: How does this native american hunk gain weight?
13.title: Rusty Smith (Stan's half-brother)

choices: He wakes up in a mansion that is all chocolate
133.title: other

1333.content:
It was 10:00 p.m. and Rusty Smith had eaten a big meal all by himself (because his wife and kids left him) and he was very tired. So he slowly want to his bedroom and layed on his king-sized bed and slowly rubbed his gut in large circles with his hand.

You see, after his wife left him and took the kids, he was free to do what he want, and what he wanted was to eat and sleep, and as a result: fatness, and he LOVED every minute of it!

And as he rubbed his gut, he started to get hungry again, but he fell into a deep sleep...
1333.title: Rusty Smith and the Chocolate Mansion

13331.content:
He awoke to the smell of something delicious, and to his surprise, his whole bedroom was made out of solid chocolate!

Rusty was getting hungry and started to eat the pillows on his bed...Mmmm, not bad, he thought to himself as he licked his lips and continued to eat his bed!

After he ate his bed, he continued to eat everything in his bedroom, from his dresser, to his lamp, hell, even everything in his closet!

Well, by now, his shirt started to feel a little tight around his waist, causing his buttons to strain a little.

He found one more random thing and gulped it down, causing a button to pop off!

Placing a hand on is fatter gut, he heard it growl, and so he searched his mansion for more chocolate furniture to eat...
13331.title: *in Rusty's dream...*

choices: Avery doesn't burps and nothing happend
Stan puts and experiment growth syrum on all of the food and feeds it to Avery
14.content:
Avery is a man to be respected. At the age of 65 most men at his age couldn't do the things Avery was able to do. Back flips, Hand-to-Hand Combat, or be able to look sexy without a full head of hair. Even though Avery was still whole in life there was one thing holding him back, having a wife. After Avery's previous wife had left him he could never find anyone like her to suit his needs, Avery just gave up and decided on one thing. Food condolence! He ran out of his office, grabbed Agent Smith, and drove off once they got into Avery's car.

"Sir,what the hell is going on?" ,Stan said in concern and confusions. "Don't worry smith we're just stopping at a few fast food places for me to "puff up" as the kids say nowadays.", said Avery. They stopped 8 different fast-food joints and drove back to Avery's luxury mansion in the most sophisticated part of town.

As the men grab the food and walk into the door Stan is shocked to see the living room filled with food, in fact the whole house was filled with food. "Sir,what is this place?", Stan said as stood there in amazement looking at the fast void of food. "It's my food-house. I built just in case of two things. The world coming to an end or Just to gorge myself to pop out of m clothing, said Avery. "Go put the food on the pill,Smith. I'll go get the chair." As Stan puts the food onto the pile Avery comes back with an enormous chair. "Strap me in,Smith. I'm ready to gorge!". As Stan sits Bullock down and straps him in tightly to make sure he can't get out, Stan,without hesitation,grabs 5 trays of cheesecake and starts feeding it to Avery.

"Mmmm, NomNom! Oh,this is wonderful! *eats two more slices of cheesecake.* Why don't more people do this?", said Avery. After finishing all 5 trays Avery's stomach seems to haven't grown as much as it should. "How about something to wash it down,Sir?", asked Stan. "That would sound good.", agreed Avery. Stan grab 10 different sodas and poured them all down his boss's throat. "Now whatever you do, DON'T BURP! I cannot stress this enough. The gas will build up causes your belly to bloat,fast!", said Stan in excitement.
14.title: Avery Bullock

choices: Avery's belly is rapidly growing out of control
Avery wants to stop,but Stan won't let him
141.content:
The soda set in Avery's stomach. He started to get a little uncomfortable due to the gas rapidly building up in his slightly bloated belly. Avery urged to rub his aching stomach,but alas he couldn't since his arms were strapped to the feeding chair: he would ask Stan to rub his stomach for him,but he didn't like the idea of men touching.

"Ooh...",said Avery "I feel like I'm going to pop,Smith. And it feels so,Mmmmm,Good." As the speed of Avery's bloated stomach increase per second,buttons start to pop open,Avery's stomach widened and grew larger and larger. Stan couldn't resist the urge to feed his boss while this was happening.
141.title: Avery doesn't burp and bloats

choices: Stan rubs Avery's belly to calm him
Stan calls in The SWAT team to help
1411.content:
Avery's belly seemed to swell up with every passing second. The button on his pants popped open and hit Stan in the face. Stan couldn't resist to kiss his boss's belly as is was as hard as a rock and inflating at the same time. The hairs on Avery's belly were flat due to Stan's excessive kissing. Avery let out a moan and Stan continue to stuff his boss with food as he did.

"T-The Pressure", said Avery, "I want to bloat out of control,Smith. Make it Happen."

"Yes,Sir!" ,Stan said as he, poured fizz rocks into all the carbonated beverages and poured them into his boss's mouth and still stuffing his with a variety of food at the same.

Avery now not only swallow the liquid, but begin to suck it, taking bigger and bigger mouthful. Each time, his cheek expand more than the last.
His belly was now stretching to the max, forming a growing large ball. And it rises ans rises... Alarming sound come from his gut...
Stan began to be nervous, he touched the giant belly: it was hard and tense. The biggest belly he had EVER seen.
"YOU CAN'T TELL ME YOU'RE STILL HUNGRY?!? ARE YOU!?!",said Stan.
Avery nod!
His belly inflating to an absolute limit, making a loud stretching sound.

Stan started to feed Avery coffee and cold cookie dough,but after a few hours Stan notices his boss biting his lips and his face turning red: after his coffee, he didn't feel well,and realized what's happening... The warm weather and the hot coffee made the dough expand in his belly!! His ball gut the size of a basketball what pushing forward slowly, and it didn't stop! "OOOOoommpph, I'm so big, I'm about to... explode.... OOOOOOoooooo.", said Avery in satisfactory pain.
1411.title: Avery's belly is rapidly growing out of con...

choices: Stan tries to find out what happed
Skip to Avery who is eating the food and getting bigger
14112.content:
Avery started to squirm he moved from side to side trying to rub his belly. His nostrils flared and his skin turned red.

There was a stop, Avery calmed down and looked up at Stan and whispered... "Oh,no!" Avery's feet started to grow bursting out of shoes and turning them into tiny pieces. He grew and grew and his belly was getting bigger. Stan started to scoot back and looking up at his boss turning into a giant fat hulk. Buttons were flying off of Avery and his pants exploded leaving him in his stretchy boxers. Avery grunted and growl as his skin turn brown like the shade of chocolate cookies. He out grew the house, but before he left the neighborhood he at the rest of the food in the house and stomp away
14112.title: Avery outgrows the house

info.brief_description: Any man from American Dad can gain
info.description:
The Rules:

Rule 1: Men only. No children & females

Rule 2: No weight limits

Rule 3:No killing of characters

Rule 4: All men are gay

Rule 5: Keep language to a minimum

Rule 6: Sex is not allowed only hugging & kissing

Rule 7: Force Feeding is OK

Rule 8: Stick with main character of the story; e.i. if story's about Stan, stick with him other men can be in stoies too

Rule 9: Beside these rules, Add & have fun

Enjoy
